ygData.subject: Re: Which song for soloing?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, supposedly the higher your STR the more often you will do full dmg with your weapon when you hit a mob, or even greater than max dmg for a type of
ygData.messageBody:
>Has anybody figured out exactly what it is increased str does?
>And as I said yesterday, the speed boost for both the anthem
>and the whistling warsong do not stack, so there's less of a
>reason to use both together. (Would be interested if others
>find differently)

Well, supposedly the higher your STR the more often you will do full dmg
with your weapon when you hit a mob, or even greater than max dmg for a type
of weapon. I noticed I did 17 or 18 pts more often with a mino axe when STR
was buffed. Did it much less often without any STR.

Sartori of Kelethin
